data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Shop Materials Tileset - Interior / Exterior
data.detailed_description:
【About】

A third set of DLC series by Dot-E Seisakujo (Y-pot), the company that created many of the RPG Maker MZ default materials!
"Shop Material Tileset - Interior/Exterior" is a set of handy supplemental materials for those who want to expand on the default materials. There are 9 sheets of Interior Materials and 9 sheets of Exterior Materials in this collection!

With just this collection, you can build not only a shop, but an entire city!

Make your own city by arranging the "Shop Exterior Materials" however you want!

The "Shop Interior Materials" pack includes a plethora of weapons and armors!
For example, the "Weapon sheet" contains a spear, staff, bow, gun, and other items! The "Armor sheet" includes a shield, mantle, hat, footwear, and other useful items that could be used as prop to decorate an armory shop, palaces and castles.

Not only that! There are also materials such as menu board, oven, kitchen counter, food, and drinks... everything needed to build a restaurant, cafe, or even an inn!

As an added bonus, the weapons in the "Weapon Sheet" can also be used in side-view battle scenes!

With just this collection, which is full of useful materials for creating various types of shops, restaurants, and cafes... the possibilities are endless!

=========================================================
Contents

・characters：2sheet
・system：26sheet（Weapon-sheet）
・tilesets：18sheet

▼tilesets
Shop_Inside_A1
Shop_Inside_A2
Shop_Inside_A4
Shop_Inside_A5
Shop_Inside_B
Shop_Inside_C
Shop_Inside_D
Shop_Inside_E
Shop_Inside_F

Shop_Outside_A1
Shop_Outside_A2
Shop_Outside_A3
Shop_Outside_A4
Shop_Outside_A5
Shop_Outside_B
Shop_Outside_C
Shop_Outside_D
Shop_Outside_E
=========================================================
